thread.title: Report: Google Pixel 2 to offer waterproof design and better camera, budget Pixel 2B in the works
thread.title_full: Report: Google Pixel 2 to offer waterproof design and better camera, budget Pixel 2B in the works

title: Report: Google Pixel 2 to offer waterproof design and better camera, budget Pixel 2B in the works
text:
January 27, 2017 “Google will reportedly also be launching a budget Pixel 2B smartphone this year” 
It appears that Google is working on the successors to the Pixel and Pixel XL ( review ) smartphones. 9TO5Google reports that the Google Pixel 2 will arrive with improved camera features, a water-resistant body, an advanced processor and higher pricing. The source also suggests that the company is also working on a budget Pixel smartphone, which will allegedly be launched as the Pixel 2B. 
The report suggests that Google is thinking about adding a water-resistant body to the Pixel 2 smartphone. The brand is not sure about adding this feature, but it’s still on the table. The phone will feature the same 12.3MP rear camera as the Pixel, but will get advanced low-light photography and will also be getting some new features. The source suggests that the Google Pixel 2 prototypes are being tested with Snapdragon 83X processors, and others with Intel chipsets. 
The report claims that the Google Pixel 2 will arrive with an expensive price tag of $700, around Rs 47,700. The brand will also be launching a Pixel 2B, which will come with modest specs as well as lower price tag. The company is reportedly aiming to bring the Google experience and Google Phone to developing markets with the Pixel 2B. There’s no word when the brand is planning to launch the next-gen Pixel phones at the moment.
